DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate differences in intraoperative body temperature between heated huimid breathing circuit and conventional breathing circuit
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Breathing Circuits on Intraoperative Body Temperature
DOC.criteria: aged 1870 years, ASA I or II patients scheduled for craniotomy under general anesthesia ASA III or IV Duration of anesthesia time less than 4 hours emergency operation
